content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STParcel_PY3Month') )
    DROP VIEW dbo.T_STParcel_PY3Month
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[T_STParcel_PY3Month]

AS 

SELECT 
* 
FROM dbo.T_STParcel
WHERE lms_parcel_pdate >= DATEADD(yy,-1,DATEADD(m,-3, DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE()),0)))
AND lms_parcel_pdate <= DATEADD(yy,-1,DATEADD(nanosecond,-50,DATEADD(d,1,CAST(CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS DATETIME2(7)))))
